newsitem.title: JORDAN: Jordanian PM Kabariti to be replaced-sources.
newsitem.headline: Jordanian PM Kabariti to be replaced-sources.

text.p: Jordan's Prime Minister Abdul-Karim al-Kabariti will offer his resignation to King Hussein on Wednesday, sources said.
The sources told Reuters Kabariti would be replaced by former prime minister Abdul-Salam al-Majali, who will appoint a new cabinet.
